summary: I have made these static armors & clothing for my own mods and decided that I'd share them with you guys to use in your own mods. :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6][color=#548dd4][font=Fixedsys]Static Armors & Clothing Resource
[/font][/color][/size][/b][/center][b][size=6][color=#548dd4][font=Fixedsys]

[/font][/color][/size][/b][size=5][b][color=#eeece1]I have made these static armors & clothing for my own mods and decided that I'd share them with you guys to use in your own mods. :)  Please give me credit if you use this resource.[/color]
I will be continually updating this resource and adding more pieces of armor & clothing. Please leave the relevant credits in your mods! 



[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69691-0-1442192417.png[/img][/center]


[/b][/size][color=#eeece1][size=5]*Instructions For Use: [/size][/color]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b][b][color=#c0504d][i](After you have placed the meshes in the appropriate folder)[/i][/color][/b]
[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]1. Load up the Creation Kit and create a new Static object.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]
[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]2. Give it an appropriate ID and click on Edit.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]
[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]3. Where it says Model File Name, click on Edit.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]
[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]4. Go to my mesh folder (Data>Meshes>Zylice) and choose the armor that you wish.[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Fixedsys][size=5][color=#f2dcdb][b]
[/b][/color][/size][/font][size=5]
[/size][color=#eeece1][font=Georgia][size=5][b]5. You can now use my static armors in your mods. :)[/b]
[/size][/font]

[/color][b][center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69691-0-1442192417.png[/img]



[youtube]4ojLer8bqJ4[/youtube][/center]
[/b]

[font=Times New Roman]
[color=#1e84cc][size=6]*[url=http://zyliceliddell.weebly.com/#/]Visit Website For All Of My Mods & Resources![/url][/size][/color][/font]
author: Zylice
